description:
Introducing Savana, for all the ways you love to dress. Step into the spotlight with styles inspired by the hottest trends, so your fit checks are always on point!

Join the #SavanaSquad and embrace your inner trendsetter as we curate statement pieces straight from your moodboard to empower you to dress for the adventure of everyday life.

Savana’s social-first approach transcends boundaries, inviting you to a world where fashion knows no limits. With the support of our vibrant community, we're reshaping the fashion landscape one outfit at a time.

Experience a whole new energy on our app:

- New Styles added daily: Experience the thrill of early access to exclusive drops, flash sales.
- Exclusive offers - Be the first to know about our exclusive offers that'll set your pulse racing.
- Fast and secure checkout: With secure checkout and multiple payment options, your fashion dreams are just a tap away.
- Track your order - Delivery tracked straight from checkout to your door.
- Easy returns - Shopping made easy with fuss-free returns, no questions asked.
- Free Shipping on all order - makes your life easy.


We can’t wait to see you on the Savana app! You can also find us on:
https://www.instagram.com/savana_ar

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

بتطبيق ڤانيلا ستجد كل ما تريد من اشياء مختلفه ومتنوعة حيث ستجد مختلف انواع البراندات و المنتجات المختلفه والرائعة التي يمكنك شرائها و التي ستعجبك كثيرا

آشوس هو موقع وتطبيق تسوق الكتروني يقدم خدماته في العراق ويوفر المنتجات الاصلية و المميزة المختارة بعناية. 
يوفر آشوس تجربة تسوق جديدة وذلك بالتركيز على سعادة الزبون من خلال عدة امور منها التوصيل السريع ( ١-٣ يوم لكل انحاء العراق ) وكذلك سياسة الاسترجاع والاستبدال التي تضمن للزبون تبديل او استرجاع اي منتج لم يعجبه. 

يحتوي متجر آشوس الاف من المنتجات التي تخص النساء والرجال والاطفال والمنزل منها العطور الاصلية والملابس و الاكسسوارات و منتجات العنايه.

Discover Iraq’s biggest car marketplace, with over 65,000 cars for sale from every corner of the country! Whether you’re looking to buy or sell, we’ve got you covered.

* Set up alerts so you’ll know the moment your dream car pops up.  
* Enjoy personalized offers from top car brands just for you!

Ready to find your perfect ride or sell your car today? Join us now!

developer: iBazzar Company for Technology, E-Commerce and Online Advertising LTD
description:
Buy & sell real estate, cars, fashion, electronics & more. Fast delivery in Iraq!

Welcome to iBazzar – Iraq’s trusted marketplace for shopping and selling online. Whether you're looking to buy everyday essentials or sell your own car, house, or used items, iBazzar brings everything you need in one easy-to-use app. From electronics and clothing to kitchenware and self-care products, enjoy a seamless shopping experience designed for Iraq.

REAL ESTATE, CARS, ELECTRONICS, FASHION, HOME, KITCHEN, BEAUTY & MORE

Explore a wide variety of categories across the app. Shop for brand-new and used smartphones, TVs, laptops, and appliances. Browse the latest clothing for men, women, and kids. Upgrade your space with home furniture and kitchen essentials. Post your house, land, or car for sale and connect directly with interested buyers. Whether you're a casual shopper or a business owner, iBazzar supports your journey.

SELL YOUR PRODUCTS FAST

Selling on iBazzar is easy – just upload photos, add a description, and start receiving messages from buyers across Iraq. You can list personal items, store products, or large assets like homes and vehicles. Manage your listings, mark products as sold, and reach real users near you.

TRUSTED SHOPPING EXPERIENCE IN IRAQ

iBazzar is built for the Iraqi market, offering localized features that fit your lifestyle. Many items support delivery, giving buyers the option to receive products at home. Sellers can manage orders and communicate safely through in-app chat, while buyers can enjoy transparency, quality, and real-time support.

EXCLUSIVE DEALS & DISCOUNTS

Take advantage of limited-time offers, seasonal promotions, and featured deals from top sellers. From tech and fashion to beauty and home goods, find the right product at the right price.

MULTIPLE CATEGORIES & GROWING STORES

iBazzar isn’t just a buy-and-sell app – it’s a full marketplace. Discover local stores offering everything from electronics to kitchen tools. Support businesses near you or start your own digital store in minutes.

SECURE PAYMENTS & DELIVERY OPTIONS

Pay with cash on delivery for a safe and simple checkout experience. Enjoy fast and reliable delivery for select categories, available in major cities across Iraq.

MADE FOR IRAQ

iBazzar is proudly made for Iraq and growing every day. Whether you’re in Baghdad, Erbil, Basra, or beyond – the app connects people across the country with the products and opportunities they’re looking for.

Whether you call it Bazzar, Bazar, Baazar, Bazaar, Baazzaar, Bazzaar, Bazarr, Baazzaarr – all roads lead to one place: iBazzar.

Download iBazzar today and join thousands of users across Iraq buying, selling, and discovering new deals every day.

سما تتيح لك إمكانية التسوق من مختلف المواقع بكل أمان. قم بتسوق مختلف المنتجات الشخصية والمنزلية من راحة بيتك. تتميز سما بالتالي:

1.	إمكانية التسوق من مختلف المواقع بتطبيق يوفر تجربة موحدة وسلسه

2.	خدمة الدفع عند الاستلام 

3.	شفافية تامة بكافة الأسعار المعروضة من دون أي رسوم مخفية

4.	أفضل أسعار الشحن وأسعار منافسة على جميع المتاجر

5.	إضافة متاجر ومواقع جديدة بشكل مستمر تتيح لك إمكانية التسوق من تشكليه واسعه من المنتجات والبضائع

7.	إمكانية تتبع الطلب من وقت التثبيت وحتى إيصاله لباب بيتك 

8.	واجهة تطبيق بالعربية والانجليزية لسهولة الاستخدام

خدمتك ورضائك هي أهم أولوياتنا، لذلك نسعى لتقديم خدمة عملاء مميزة لتجربة تسوق آمنه

Qivon – Your Fashion, Your Style

Discover the latest women’s fashion and beauty trends with Qivon, your go-to shopping app for affordable and stylish clothing, shoes, and accessories.

We bring the best designs from Korea, Japan, and China—delivering them directly to you in Iraq and across the Middle East.

Why Qivon?
• Trendy New Arrivals: Hundreds of new styles every week – dresses, tops, abayas, shoes, bags, and more.
• Affordable Prices: Enjoy fashionable looks without breaking the bank.
• Cash on Delivery: Pay safely when your order arrives.
• Fast & Reliable Delivery: Trusted logistics covering all regions of Iraq.
• 10-Day Easy Returns: Shop with confidence – return within 10 days if not satisfied.

Smart Shopping Experience
• Image Search: Upload a photo and instantly find similar products.
• Personalized Recommendations: Get fashion ideas tailored to your taste.
• Multilingual Support: Available in Arabic and English for a seamless experience.

For Every Occasion
From everyday essentials to elegant dresses and statement accessories, Qivon makes it easy to stay in style for any occasion.

Download Qivon today and enjoy a new way to shop fashion – simple, fast, and inspired by K-Fashion.

developer: LC Waikiki Magazacilik Hizmetleri Ticaret A.S.
description:
Everyone Deserves to Dress Well!  

Welcome to the Official LC Waikiki Shopping App!  

We're here to help you dress according to your style and budget, ensuring you feel great. Our mission, 'Everyone Deserves to Dress Well,' invites you to the most stylish destination in fashion.  

If you want to stay up-to-date with fashion and trends, enjoy easy shopping anytime, anywhere! Download the LC Waikiki app to quickly and easily access all information about our leading brand in the clothing industry.  

The easiest way to stay trendy and shop smart is right here! Download our app now and express your style.  

With our LC Waikiki shopping app:  

- Access the trendiest products in women's, men's, kids’ and baby fashion; explore our wide range of home textiles, accessories, and gifts.  
- Activate notifications and stay updated on campaigns, exclusive discounts and surprises for the app, newly added products and fashion trends.  
- Use your favourite list to save all the products you like.  
- Shop quickly and securely with various payment options.  
- Track your orders and returns in each part of the process easily and quickly.

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

Al Shaheera is Iraq’s leading beauty destination for a refined, seamless shopping experience. Explore curated makeup, perfumes, accessories, watches, and professional beauty-center tools. Discover our exclusive LA-SHAHEERA PRIVE concept tailored for luxury lovers.
Enjoy smooth navigation, secure checkout, order tracking, and instant notifications for new arrivals and offers. With expanding branches across Iraq, we deliver fast shipping and trusted service wherever you are. 
Apple

Highlights

Authentic beauty & fragrance selections

Elegant accessories, watches, and gifts

Exclusive deals and rotating discounts

Secure payments & order tracking

Fast delivery across Iraq

Step into the world of elegance with Al Shaheera.

Miraaya – Your Ultimate Beauty Shopping Destination! 

Step into the world of premium beauty with Miraaya, your go-to online store for skincare, makeup, haircare, and fragrances. Whether you’re searching for bestselling beauty brands, expert recommendations, or exclusive deals, Miraaya delivers a seamless shopping experience with authentic products, personalized beauty tips, and fast delivery.

 Why Shop with Miraaya?
Shop top beauty brands – Explore a curated selection of international and local beauty favorites.
100% authentic products guaranteed – No more fear of counterfeit items!
Personalized recommendations – Get tailored skincare and makeup suggestions for your beauty needs.
Easy & secure online shopping – Intuitive browsing, smooth checkout, and secure payments.
Fast delivery & multiple payment options – Cash on Delivey , Debit/Credit Card or Zain Cash

Everything You Need – All in One Place!

 Makeup & Cosmetics
Discover best-selling brands like Anastasia Beverly Hills (ABH), Huda Beauty, Yves Saint Laurent (YSL), KIKO Milano, Sisley and TheBalm
From full glam to natural everyday looks, find products tailored for every skin tone.
Get early access to exclusive beauty launches and limited-edition collections.

 Skincare & Treatments
Build your ideal skincare routine with Clarins, Belif, Mario Badescu, The Ordinary and CeraVe
Shop dermatologist-approved skincare, from hydrating serums to anti-aging solutions.
Get free virtual skincare consultations from beauty specialists.

Fragrances & Perfumes
Choose from signature scents and luxury perfumes from Amouage, Jean Paul Gaultier, Giorgio Armani , Prada and Parfums de Marly.
Discover gift sets and mini perfumes for special occasions.
Find exclusive, hard-to-find fragrances that match your style.

 Haircare & Styling
Treat your hair with salon-quality brands like Kérastase, Olaplex, Kevin Murphy,
Discover solutions for all hair types – curly, straight, wavy, or color-treated.
Shop hair styling tools and accessories for effortless glam.

Exclusive Miraaya App Features!
One-Stop Beauty Shopping – Browse, compare, and shop the latest in beauty.
Secure & Flexible Payments – Pay with Card, Cash on Delivey , or Zain Cash
Exclusive Offers & Flash Sales – Get access to discounts on top beauty brands.
Order Tracking & Hassle-Free Returns – Stay updated with real-time tracking.
Wishlist & Favourites – Save your must-have products for easy shopping later.

Miraaya is your ultimate destination for beauty shopping! No more searching for trusted products – we bring them straight to you!

Download the Miraaya App Now & Start Shopping Today!

Discover Naay, Iraq’s Premier Online Beauty Emporium—your one-stop destination for authentic Korean skincare, luxury global cosmetics, and expert-curated self-care essentials. With over 3,000 meticulously selected products spanning Face Care, Body Care, Hair Care, Lip Care, Makeup, Perfumes, Kits, Tools, and more, Naay empowers every Iraqi beauty enthusiast to achieve radiant, confidence-boosting results.
What Makes Naay Unmatched?
    * Guaranteed Authenticity: We partner directly with top Korean labels (COSRX, Dr.Jart+, Laneige, Manyo, Round Lab, Purito, Neogen, and more) and world-renowned brands (The Ordinary, Huda Beauty, Rare Beauty, Fenty, Sephora Collection) to ensure every item is 100% genuine.
    * Extensive, Always-Growing Selection: From potent serums, advanced exfoliating acids, and luxurious sheet masks to exclusive body kits, fragrance launches, and seasonal makeup palettes—you’ll find new arrivals and limited-edition discoveries weekly.
    * Hyper-Local, Lightning-Fast Delivery: Enjoy same-day delivery in Baghdad and Erbil, next-day service to Basrah, Najaf, Sulaymaniyah and beyond—packaged with care to reach you flawlessly.
    * Exclusive VIP Deals & Launch Alerts: Opt in for push notifications to snag flash sales, bundle offers, and the very first drops of Korean–Iraqi collabs and global makeup lines.
    * Personalized Beauty Journey: Our in-app quiz and AI-driven recommendations craft routines customized for your skin type, concerns, and preferences—whether you’re fighting acne, fine lines, dryness, or looking for that perfect glowy finish.
    * Expert Content & Community: Dive into tutorials, ingredient guides, trend reports, and user reviews—all in Arabic and English—to stay ahead of global beauty innovations and local favorites.

Why You’ll Love Shopping at Naay
    * Curated by Professionals: Each product is hand-vetted by skincare experts and makeup artists to meet the highest efficacy and safety standards.
    * User-Friendly Experience: Intuitive category filters (by brand, concern, format, and price), saved wishlists, seamless checkout, and multiple payment options (cash on delivery, card, Wallet).
    * Committed to Transparency: Full ingredient lists, clear “how-to” usage tips, and honest star-rated reviews from fellow customers across Iraq.
    * Community & Support: 24/7 in-app chat, styling advice, and after-care follow-ups—because your beauty journey at Naay doesn’t end at checkout.

Download Naay now and transform your daily beauty ritual with the best of Korea and the globe—right at your fingertips in Iraq. Elevate your glow, indulge in self-care, and join a thriving community of beauty enthusiasts who trust Naay for authenticity, variety, and unmatched convenience.

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

Elixir – إعادة تعريف التسوّق عبر مقاطع الفيديو القصيرة

اكتشف طريقة جديدة وممتعة لتصفّح وشراء المنتجات: يحوّلك Elixir إلى تجربة تسوّق غنية بمقاطع الفيديو القصيرة، حيث يمكنك استعراض أحدث الصيحات من الأزياء والتجميل والإلكترونيات وديكور المنزل، ثم الشراء بنقرة واحدة.

المميزات الرئيسية
تصفح مدعوم بالفيديو: اسحب للأعلى والأسفل لمشاهدة مقاطع فيديو قصيرة مصمّمة خصيصًا لك. تقنية التحميل المسبق والتجزئة الذكية تضمن عرضًا فوريًّا ودون تقطيع.
شراء داخل الفيديو: أعجبك منتج؟ اضغط “أضف إلى السلة” مباشرة من المقطع دون مغادرة الشاشة.
محرّر فيديو مدمج: سجّل وحرّر مقاطعك باستخدام محرّر داخلي متقدّم: طبق الفلاتر، وأضف الملصقات والنصوص، وشاركها فورًا داخل التطبيق—لا حاجة لأدوات خارجية.
تنبيهات في الوقت الحقيقي: تابع العروض المحدودة وتخفيضات الأسعار وتوفر المنتجات وإشعارات حالة الطلب حسب تفضيلاتك.
تفاعل اجتماعي: أعجب، علّق وشارك المقاطع مع أصدقائك أو على منصات التواصل. تابع المبدعين والمتاجر المفضّلة لديك واكتشف مجتمعات تشاركك ذوقك.
توصيات ذكية: يتعلّم Elixir من اختياراتك ليقدّم لك منتجات مخصصة تناسب اهتماماتك.
التخزين للمشاهدة لاحقًا: احفظ مقاطعك المفضّلة لمشاهدتها لاحقاً او أوفلاين، مثالية للرحلات والمناطق ذات الاتصال المحدود.
بحث وفلاتر متقدمة: حدّد النتائج بسرعة بحسب الفئة، العلامة التجارية أو الشعبية لتصل إلى ما تريد بالضبط.
قائمة أمنيات ومجموعات: احفظ المنتجات لتعيد زيارتها أو شاركها مع الأصدقاء ضمن مجموعات مُنسّقة.
دفع آمن ومرن: اختر من بين بطاقات الائتمان، المحافظ الإلكترونية وطرق الدفع المضمّنة داخل التطبيق.

لماذا ستعشق Elixir؟
Elixir ليس مجرد تطبيق؛ بل هو مجتمع للتسوق يدمج المتعة مع الراحة. سواء كنت من محبّي الصيحات الجديدة، أو تبحث عن أفضل العروض، أو مبدعًا يودّ عرض منتجاته، ستجد في Elixir المنصة الأمثل التي تبقيك متفاعلًا ومتجددًا.

كيفية الاستخدام
تصفّح: اسحب لمشاهدة مقاطع قصيرة مصممة حسب ذوقك.
اكتشف: اضغط للاطّلاع على التفاصيل، القراءة عن تقييمات المستخدمين، والمقارنة بين المنتجات.
اشترِ: أضف إلى السلة وأكمل الدفع بأمان وسرعة.
اصنع وشارك: سجّل مقاطعك، علّم المنتجات، وألهم الآخرين.

انضم إلى حركة Elixir
حوّل كل تمريرة إلى لحظة اكتشاف. حمّل Elixir الآن وابدأ رحلة التسوّق الديناميكية التي تنتظرها!

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

1688APP, China’s leading wholesale marketplace now officially available in Vietnam/Kazakhstan. We belong to the business of Alibaba Group,  the global B2B procurement and Sourcing hub for millions of business sellers.
Need Factory-Direct products with lower prices and stable quality? Now you can find all of them on 1688, and of course, buy more to save more!
Custom products, consumer goods, industrial items, accessories, electronics, raw materials and so on. Discover Authentic Products come directly from Chinese factories. Also, making it easy for you to negotiate with factories and suppliers. 
We customised wholesale purchasing services for global buyers, Multi-language, Direct and Reliable Logistics, and International Payment Options have been integrated into our new APP.
Register now to enjoy Limited Discounts and Hassle-free  Global Sourcing Experience!

developer: Abwab Al Tasawuq General Trading Llc
description:
Welcome to Miswag - your first stop in Iraq for online shopping!

Experience the ultimate online shopping experience with Miswag, Iraq’s first online shopping site. It includes over 2,000 original local and international brands, including electronics, video games, cosmetics, home appliances, fashion, children’s products, and more.

Why Choose Miswag?
Discover everything you need among 2,000+ original, international, and local brands spanning various categories and sections!

Wide Variety Of Original Products
Explore over 170,000 products across diverse categories and sections, making it easy to order everything you need from a single place.

Flexible Browsing
Easily find and save your favorite products with our smart search, easy-to-use filters, and sorting options, then seamlessly transfer them to your shopping cart for a streamlined and efficient ordering experience.

Delivery to everywhere inside Iraq
Experience the convenient shipping and delivery service offered by the Miswag application, including free delivery for your first order, available throughout Iraq!

Secure Checkout Options
Miswag offers multiple secure and swift payment options, including payment upon receipt, electronic payment cards (MasterCard or Visa Card), as well as convenient choices like Zain Cash and Asia Transfer.
Points program for various discounts
Every Miswag order earns you points that can be redeemed in the future for discounts on your next purchase or special offers from Miswag's partners, including restaurants, cafes, transportation services, and food ordering and delivery.

Buy now and pay later with Qi
Miswag offers the ease of requesting services and paying at your own pace with installment options via Qi cards, allowing you to spread the payment over a period of 6 months.

Guaranteed Quality
Whether it's the products you order, pick-up and post-pick-up services, or exchanges and returns, Miswag assures you 100% confidence in handling all your requests and inquiries.

Excellent customer service
Miswag support team is available every day from 8:00 AM to 12:00 AM to provide you with all the answers and assistance you need to complete your requests.


Choose the best online shopping experience and download the Miswag app now!
